category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Show_session_loccode_as_companyloc_displayname
preference.preference_description: Defines the display format to be used for "Location Code" in the User Session dialog of the Rich Client. If set to false the value of the property fnd0LocationCode of Company Location business object will be displayed. If set to true the value of the property object_string of Company Location business object will be displayed. Default value is false.
